North_Las_Vegas.High Roller (Stratosphere): The High Roller (also known as the Let it Ride High Roller), was a steel roller coaster constructed on top of a building 909 feet (277 m) over the Las Vegas Strip. It was the highest roller coaster in the world when compared to the surrounding terrain. It was located on top of the Stratosphere Tower, Las Vegas, Nevada, which is the tallest free-standing observation tower in the United States.
